targets.query: SELECT "totalDuration" / 1000 FROM "reading"."rrp"."cutter-trace" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "beginAt" - 28800000  FROM "reading"."rrp"."cutter-trace" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "haltDuration"  FROM "reading"."rrp"."cutter-trace" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "operationDuration" / 1000 FROM "reading"."rrp"."cutter-trace" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
